snippet: The Agriculture Department says it is clearing the way for slaughterhouses to open unless Congress reinstates a ban.
abstract: Agriculture Secretary Tom Vilsack says domestic horse slaughterhouses will reopen soon, unless Congress reinstates ban on practice.
lead_paragraph: The Agriculture Department says it is clearing the way for slaughterhouses to open unless Congress reinstates a ban.

headline.seo: Horse Meat Processing Plant Approval Near
headline.main: Federal Approval Near for Opening of Horse Meat Processing Plant in New Mexico
headline.print_headline: Federal Approval Near for Opening of Horse Meat Processing Plant in New Mexico
